method.name: GET
method.doc: change password. this call has double functionality (key==null : request new password, key!=null && pass!=null set a password). $path is a redirect link for webpaige

method.name: POST
method.doc: import timeslots from old knrm setup

method.name: POST
method.doc: import userdata from old knrm setup

method.name: PUT
method.doc: add sessionUser? to multiple groups. payload be [groupIds]. returns array with added groupIds

method.name: POST
method.doc: create new group ( payload = name ). return new groupID

method.name: GET
method.doc: get all members in given group (+resource optional)

method.name: GET
method.doc: get groups this user is in

method.name: GET
method.doc: get members of own network group

method.name: GET
method.doc: get slots for all people in a group (multiple slots call speedup)

method.name: GET
method.doc: get wishes (in a period) for a monitoragent based on given groupID..

method.name: GET
method.doc: combine wish and (group)plannings into a single numeric timeline

method.name: GET
method.doc: get labels to use as states in planning

method.name: POST
method.doc: create resource for self. no return data

method.name: GET
method.doc: get the role(resource) for a user

method.name: PUT
method.doc: add/remove User to/from multiple groups. payload be [groupIds]. returns array with added groupIds

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get userdata (profile page) of the logged in user

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get userdata (profile page) of a user

method.name: PUT
method.doc: assign new role to user. payload= [roleNumber]

method.name: POST
method.doc: move message to TRASH. no return data

method.name: POST
method.doc: send a message. payload be {members:[],content:"",subject:"",types:[]}. invalid json response?

method.name: POST
method.doc: create a new notification action (weekly reminder)

method.name: GET
method.doc: return ddr logs of linked askfast account

method.name: GET
method.doc: get info for all monitorAgents in the domain

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get all groups in a domain

method.name: GET
method.doc: get the askfast channels for session.domain.

method.name: GET
method.doc: get list of divisions (for session domain)

method.name: GET
method.doc: get the client group by client group ID

method.name: GET
method.doc: get All the reports from specific client

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: delete the client group by ID

method.name: POST
method.doc: create client group. TODO: inspect logic on this one

method.name: GET
method.doc: get All the reports from specific client

method.name: PUT
method.doc: place rule (somewhere) above other ruleId. payload = otherRuleID

method.name: PUT
method.doc: place rule (somewhere) below other ruleId. payload = otherRuleID

method.name: GET
method.doc: retrieve instances in the previous planning format

method.name: GET
method.doc: retrieve instances in the new format. returns array of {id/start/end/value}

method.name: GET
method.doc: get all defined rules for specified user

method.name: POST
method.doc: create a new rule and returns new ruleID. example json payload => {"recurring":"BIWEEKLY","slot":{"value":"available","from":1402650000000,"to":1402653600000},"limit":{"type":"RANGE","from":946684800000},"description":"example", "type":"default" }

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get base wifi ssids filtered for a specific location

method.name: PUT
method.doc: Set presence for this user for a specific location
